summary: This is a Bank of America personal signature card and account opening document for a joint account, dated February 25, 2014. It includes a Substitute Form W-9 certification and details regarding joint ownership with survivorship options. The document appears to be a standard bank account form, with the account number and some names partially visible or redacted.

persons.name: Shaft Summers
persons.context: Listed as the associate at the banking center (Church Ave and Ocean Ave) who processed or was involved with the account opening.

events.title: Bank Account Opening

locations: CHURCH AVE AND OCEAN AVE (Banking Center location)
keyFacts: A Bank of America joint account was opened on February 25, 2014, with a personal signature card and tax form W-9.
The document specifies joint ownership options, including with or without survivorship, relevant for estate planning.
The banking center location is Church Ave and Ocean Ave, with associate Shaft Summers listed.
Account details and customer names appear to be partially redacted or incomplete in the provided text.
